text:
-tAqM ~Mvasa#vO ruqdrA A#diqtyA anuq vyA#yaqn tEShAqmAdhi#patyamAsIq-nnava#vi(gm) SatyA&stuvataq vanaqspata#yO&sRujyantaq sOmO &dhi#patirAsIq-dEka#tri(gm)SatA &stuvata praqjA a#sRujyantaq yAvA#nAqM cAyA#vAnAqM cA&&dhi#patyamAsIqt traya#stri(gm)SatA &stuvata BUqtAnya#SAmyan praqjApa#tiH paramEqShThyadhi#patirAsIt || 20
(saqM~MvaqthsaqrO&dhi#patiq- rvi - pa~jca#tri(gm)Sacca) (A10)
